H4709.def: = town, also known as {L:Mizpeh<SDBH:מִצְפֶּה>}; ◄ in {L:Gilead<SDBH:גִּלְעָד>}; ► location where {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Laban<SDBH:לָבָן>} built a monument after their reconciliation; also residence of {L:Jephthah<SDBH:יִפְתָּח>}

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H7122.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H8596.def: = musical instrument, consisting of a membrane, usually of animal skin, which was stretched over a shallow circular, triangular, or square frame; ► it was struck sharply with one or two hands, depending on where it was situated; it could be held in one hand, under the arm, or against the chest and struck with the other hand, or it could be held on the knees or the ground and struck with one or two hands; the fingers of one hand could be used to tighten or loosen the tension on the membrane as it was struck

H4246.def: = action by which humans dance a round dance; ≈ associated with joy

H3173.def: = state in which humans are not part of a larger group or community

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H176.def: = particle linking two entities by which X and Y are alternative options that exclude each other

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7167.def: = causative action by which humans or animals rip apart the human body or an inanimate object, either in part of entirely; usually with their hands

H899.def: = piece of cloth used to cover an object

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H3766.def: = process by which humans or animals sink on their knees ◄ as a result of being unable to keep standing up

H595.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H5360.def: = action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong and so find relief from their anger

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H5983.def: = nation; ◄ situated E. of river {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}; according to {S:00101903800100200} founded by {L:Ben-Ammi<SDBH:בֶּן־עַמִּי>}, son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H595.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H7464.def: = someone who has kind regard for and is in friendly relationship with another person

H1058.def: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

H1331.def: = state of being a young unmarried woman, who has never been married before, and has never slept with a man

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H5088.def: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H2706.def: = specific actions required by somebody in authority

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H702.def: = state in which a countable entity is four in number

H1569.def: = inhabitant or descendant of {L:Gilead<SDBH:גִּלְעָד>}, tribe and territory of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}
